Key Arguments: The proposed legislation will suppress legitimate scientific debate and dissent.
Historical examples show that what was once considered misinformation was later proven correct.
Government policies during the COVID-19 pandemic were themselves misinformation, leading to harm.
The legislation could entrench bad policies by silencing dissenting voices.
Main Themes: Criticism of government policies during COVID-19
Notable Quotes: Throughout history many scientific discoveries that have been made have been made by dedicated people going against the prevailing thought â€“ and in nearly all cases their theories would have been classed as 'misinformation' at that time.
The proposed legislation is extremely dangerous as it will stifle needed debate on government and other policy.
We need freedom of speech, not some government entrenched censorship as proposed by this legislation.
